name: postmint-ai
description: AI-powered marketing post generator for X platform

scripts.serve-alt: node -e "const http = require('http'), fs = require('fs'), path = require('path'); http.createServer((req, res) => { const filePath = req.url === '/' ? './app.html' : '.' + req.url; const extname = path.extname(filePath); const contentType = { '.html': 'text/html', '.css': 'text/css', '.js': 'application/javascript', '.ico': 'image/x-icon' }[extname] || 'text/plain'; fs.readFile(filePath, (err, content) => { if (err) { res.writeHead(404); res.end('Not found'); } else { res.writeHead(200, { 'Content-Type': contentType }); res.end(content, 'utf-8'); } }); }).listen(8000, () => console.log('Server running at http://localhost:8000'));"

author: PostMint AI Team
